name: Her (itch) (Lumine Noctis)
description:
"She waits.

I don't know what she is waiting.

I just hope I will never find out."

Trigger Warning

Although not explicitly, this game tackles topics (mental illness, self-harm, eating disorders, blood/gore) that might be triggering.

-----------------------------------------------

'Her' is a short interactive experience, developed throughout two days, as part of the course 'Game-A-Week'. 

The given theme was 'In My Mind'. 

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
